notices.title: End Semester Exam Time Table Announced
notices.desc:
Actual Timetable and Details about the date and the papers will e displayed on the Notice Board on each floor in Department.
      
    Time Table of ESE :
    
    Mathematics - 20/4/2016
    Algorithm Design - 22/4/2016
    Theory of Computation - 25/4/2016
    Data Communications and Networking - 27/4/2016
    Computer Organization and Architecture - 29/4/2016
    Fundamentals of Database System - 2/5/2016

notices.title: Semester End Date
notices.desc: This Even Semester will end on 9th April 2016 and ESE Exams will start on 20th April.
